msg.E01: One of the required fields is not filled out!
msg.E02: The length of the email address exceeds 255 characters!
msg.E03: The length of the name exceeds 255 characters!
msg.E04: The length of the title exceeds 255 characters!
msg.E05: The phone number length exceeds 32 characters!
msg.E06: The entered email address is not valid!
msg.E07: The entered phone number is incorrect!
msg.E08: The password must be at least 8 characters long!
msg.E09: The password confirmation does not match the entered password!
msg.E11: A user with this email address is already registered in the system. Please use another email address!
msg.E13: This user is blocked and cannot use the system. Please contact the system's technical support team!
msg.E14: You do not have permission to access this resource!
msg.E15: You do not have permission to perform this action!
msg.E16: An error occurred while processing the request. Please try again!
msg.E18: The corresponding record could not be found in the database!
msg.S05: User successfully deleted from the system!
msg.S10: Company successfully deleted from the system!
msg.S13: Team successfully deleted from the system!
msg.S16: Task successfully deleted from the system!
msg.C01: Do you want to delete yourself from the system? All user data will be deleted!
msg.C02: Do you want to delete the user {{ user }} from the system? All this user's data will be deleted!
msg.C03: Do you want to block the user {{ user }}? The user will no longer be able to access the system!
msg.C04: Do you want to unblock the user {{ user }}? The user will be able to access the system!
msg.C05: Do you want to delete the company {{ name }} from the system? All this company's data will be deleted!
msg.C06: Do you want to add the user {{ user }} to the company {{ company }} as its administrator? The user will be able to access the company's resources!
msg.C07: Do you want to remove the user {{ user }}'s administrator role in this company? The user will no longer be able to access its resources!
msg.C08: Do you want to add the user {{ user }} to this team? The user will be able to access the team's resources!
msg.C09: Do you want to delete the team {{ name }} from the company {{ company }}'s team list? All team data will be deleted!
msg.C10: Do you want to remove the user {{ user }} from this team? The user will no longer be able to access the team's resources!
msg.C11: Do you want to change the user {{ user }}'s role in the team to manager? The user will be able to perform all actions related to task creation, editing, and deletion in the team!
msg.C12: Do you want to change the user {{ user }}'s role in the team to participant? The user will no longer be able to manage tasks, but will be able to view them!
msg.C13: Do you want to delete this task? All task data will be deleted.

index.headline: Add task management to your work environment
index.headlinetext: Designed for both personal and commercial use!
